changes.reasoning: Add state management for collapsible reasoning groups and file diffs. These Set-based states track which groups and files are currently expanded, allowing users to collapse/expand individual sections.

Make entire logical reasoning groups collapsible in the 'By Reasoning' tab. Clicking the reasoning header toggles visibility of all files within that group. Added chevron icons to indicate expand/collapse state and a file count indicator.
Make individual file diffs collapsible within reasoning groups. Each file header is now a clickable button that toggles the diff visibility, with chevron icons showing the current state.
Make file diffs in the fallback view (when no tracking data exists) collapsible as well, providing consistent UX across all diff views.
